title: CyclingTips Podcast: The omnium gold that ended the drought
content:
CyclingTips Podcast: The omnium gold that ended the drought

This week on the CyclingTips podcast…

We wrap up discussions of the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games and look forward to Paris 2024 in only three years. 

Transfer season is in full swing and two teams, in particular, are filling up with new riders. 

The Vuelta a España is around the corner, and the general classification already looks more entertaining than the Tour de France.

author: Abby Mickey
